body.description: Kleenex Ultra Soft Facial Tissues are soft 3-layer tissues blending indulgent softness with dependable strength. Designed for runny noses and watery eyes, Ultra Soft 3-ply tissues provide a perfect balance of unbeatable softness and strength to comfort skin and help protect your hands. America’s softest Ultra tissue (among national brands) is also the #1 preferred Ultra tissue (vs. Ultra national brands). Kleenex Ultra Soft tissue boxes feature a variety of colors and designs that complement your home decor. Stay stocked up on tissues during cold & flu, allergy, and back-to-school seasons. Skip the store and have Kleenex Ultra Soft facial tissues delivered!

Are these 3-ply? Yes, our Kleenex Ultra Soft tissues contain three soft unscented layers. Are these cube or rectangular flat boxes? These are cube boxes. What are the dimensions of the tissue and box? Each tissue measures 8.2 x 8.4in and each box is 5 x 4.5 x 3.5in What makes Kleenex Expressions different? Our Kleenex Expressions product line offers alternate print and pattern designs than our regular line. The packs are also optimized for shipping. Where are Kleenex Ultra Soft tissues made? Our tissues are manufactured in the United States.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A True Delight for Sensitive Noses!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Kleenex Ultra Soft Facial Tissues, and I must say that they have exceeded my expectations in every way. As someone with sensitive skin and a constantly runny nose, finding the perfect facial tissue has always been a challenging task. However, these tissues have truly won me over.First and foremost, the softness of these tissues is absolutely incredible. They feel like a gentle caress against my skin, offering a soothing sensation that is unmatched by any other brand I have tried. Even after multiple uses, the tissues retain their softness, preventing any irritation or discomfort.The 65-count package is a convenient size for both home and on-the-go use. I love that I can easily slip a few tissues into my bag or pocket without worrying about them getting crushed or damaged. The compact packaging is also great for keeping in different areas of my house, ensuring I always have a tissue within arm's reach.One aspect that truly sets these tissues apart is their strength. Despite their delicate texture, they are surprisingly durable and can withstand even the toughest sneezes or nose blows. I appreciate that I can rely on these tissues without worrying about any embarrassing accidents or messy situations.Furthermore, these tissues are highly absorbent, efficiently trapping moisture while remaining gentle on the skin. Thanks to their excellent absorbency, I can confidently use them for everything from wiping away tears to cleaning up minor spills. They never leave behind any residue or lint, ensuring a clean and hygienic experience.Lastly, I must mention the delightful scent that accompanies these tissues. It's not overpowering but adds a subtle freshness that enhances the overall experience. It's a nice touch that sets these tissues apart from others on the market.Overall, the Kleenex Ultra Soft Facial Tissues have become an essential part of my daily routine. They are luxuriously soft, durable, absorbent, and convenient. If you're someone with sensitive skin or a constant need for tissues, I highly recommend giving these a try. You won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and Reliable Care for Everyday Use
reviews.reviewText: The Kleenex Ultra Soft Facial Tissues have become a staple in my household, and I couldn't be happier with their performance. These tissues are truly ultra-soft and provide gentle care for my family's everyday needs.One of the standout features of these tissues is their exceptional softness. They feel incredibly gentle against the skin, making them perfect for wiping away runny noses, soothing irritated skin, or dabbing away tears. Even with frequent use, they never irritate or chafe the skin, making them ideal for everyone in the family.The pack of four boxes is a convenient and economical option, providing a total of 260 tissues. It ensures that we always have tissues on hand whenever we need them, whether it's for a quick cleanup, wiping spills, or sneezing during allergy season. The boxes are also compact and easy to place around the house or take on the go in a bag or purse.The strength of these tissues is also worth mentioning. Despite their softness, they hold up well and do not tear easily. They can handle everyday tasks with ease, making them reliable and efficient in any situation.Another great thing about these Kleenex tissues is that they are dermatologist-tested and free from any harmful chemicals. As someone with sensitive skin, I appreciate the peace of mind that comes with using these safe and gentle tissues.Overall, Kleenex Ultra Soft Facial Tissues have exceeded my expectations. They are incredibly soft, durable, and reliable for everyday use. With the pack of four, I never have to worry about running out of tissues again. Whether it's for myself or my family, I know I can always count on these tissues to provide the comfort and care we need. I highly recommend them to anyone in need of a high-quality facial tissue for daily use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice tissues
reviews.reviewText: Very nice and soft tissues. The problem I have is with the order I received on 11/17/23. The order I received was in new packing and was extremely hard to open. I am an elderly person and had to get help from a neighbor to open the box. I hope that in the future the box will be easier to open. Thank you!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and absorbent
reviews.reviewText: I keep ordering these so that say's a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tissues are fine -- but when did they change to those horrible boxes?
reviews.reviewText: They're not quite as plush as the old Kleenex but they're soft enough for our perpetually runny noses.The art on the boxes is dreadful though -- maybe ok for a bathroom or a kid's room but that's all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A friend in need..might need these.
reviews.reviewText: The pricepoint was exorbitant for these but if you are sending a package to a sick friend SEND THEM. OF all the things I sent, my friend said that the fact I was giving her the OK to cry meant the world to her. For your home wait for a sale. For a friend it's worth it to have the softest and the best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Did the job
reviews.reviewText: Acted very well as a tissue.
